column4: Sorry for repeating, but no one answered: what package(s) do I need to make ubuntu a firewall/router/proxy with traffic shaping support?
I am very new to *nix world
firestarter is a gnome firewall configurer. i did a quick search for 'traffic shaping' and came up with 'shaper' and 'wondershaper'
no hits on htb in my package list
try firestarter -- should let you get a basic firewall/router going
